inlineChunks.contents: NOT (x OR y) = (NOT x) AND (NOT y)
type User = { Name x Email x FavoriteColor }
body ~= b if the response is valid, c if it's an error message

contents:
if x then                 if x and y then
   if y then                 f
     f                    if x then
   else           <=>        g
     g                    else
   end                       h
else                      end
